title: V-t graph for coffee filter lab

content.description: A student is investigating the motion of a coffee filter as it falls to the ground through the air. The student is using a motion detector to gather data for the motion of the coffee filter as it is dropped from rest.
content.question: Data from the motion detector is used to produce the graph shown for the speed as a function of time for the filter as it falls to the ground. Which of the following describes the speed and magnitude of acceleration of the coffee filter as it falls?

choices.label: SpeedMagnitude of the AccelerationIncreasingRemains the same

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
